apps.name: Aidoku
apps.versionDescription:
• Background downloading (iOS 26+): feel free to switch off the app while your downloads (and library refresh) complete.
• Download compression: downloading should now be significantly faster and result in less storage usage by default, and you can now export downloaded chapters as cbz files.
• Automatic backups: Aidoku can now schedule periodic backups in the background just in case something happens and you need to restore old data.
• Built-in Kavita source and tracker (just like Komga).
• New search tab: redesigned look, now with filter options and search history.
• Local files improvements: metadata can now be parsed from ComicInfo.xml files (and downloads from other sources now save this).
• Download badges: see how many downloaded chapters you have, next to the unread badge.
• Many bug fixes: various iPadOS issues, Komga PDF pages, download crashes, auto tracking logic, etc.
apps.localizedDescription: Free and open source manga reader for iOS and iPadOS

versions.localizedDescription:
• Background downloading (iOS 26+): feel free to switch off the app while your downloads (and library refresh) complete.
• Download compression: downloading should now be significantly faster and result in less storage usage by default, and you can now export downloaded chapters as cbz files.
• Automatic backups: Aidoku can now schedule periodic backups in the background just in case something happens and you need to restore old data.
• Built-in Kavita source and tracker (just like Komga).
• New search tab: redesigned look, now with filter options and search history.
• Local files improvements: metadata can now be parsed from ComicInfo.xml files (and downloads from other sources now save this).
• Download badges: see how many downloaded chapters you have, next to the unread badge.
• Many bug fixes: various iPadOS issues, Komga PDF pages, download crashes, auto tracking logic, etc.

apps.name: Venera
apps.versionDescription:
What's Changed
 Update AltStore source with latest release by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/602
 Add encryptAes for js_engine by @liulifox233 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/645
 Optimize iOS full-screen back gesture implementation by @liulifox233 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/643
 Fix landscape reader layout and wrap long settings labels by @boa-z in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/640
 Enhance Cloudflare challenge detection logic by @Y-Ymeow in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/619
 interceptor: mask log by @Pacalini in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/618
 feat: skip sync setting by @Pacalini in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/563
 flutter 3.38.3 by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/648
 fix: enable multi-select actions in local comics search mode by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/650
 feat: add comment keyword blocking functionality by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/649

New Contributors
 @Y-Ymeow made their first contribution in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/619

Full Changelog: https://github.com/venera-app/venera/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

apps.name: NeoFreeBird
apps.versionDescription:
NeoFreeBird is a modified Twitter app with branding reverts, BHTwitter and other QoL modifications. It also seems to be faster compared to the official Twitter app, which says something.

Change log:

Twitter, version 11.35:
• Updated the Twitter build to 11.35

NeoFreeBird, version 2.2:
• Fixed log in issues using new sign in flow (you can only sign in to one account at once but better than nothing) [78]
• Localized the Post > Tweet replacer
• Improved the Open in Twitter extension
• Minor bug fixes and other minor improvements

There are two versions, one with FixTwitterLogin dylib (standard) and one without. Try the regular one first, and if you’re unable to install it, try the one without. Both have the new sign in flow, the one with FixTwitterLogin just has the same dylib injected as 2.1 rev 2 to trick Attestation in some cases, allowing some users to sign in to multiple accounts. It works for some and not for others.

If you are already signed in to two accounts, you will still stay signed in to them, you just can't add more.
apps.localizedDescription: A modified Twitter app, with branding reverts, BHTwitter and other QoL modifications.

versions.localizedDescription:
NeoFreeBird is a modified Twitter app with branding reverts, BHTwitter and other QoL modifications. It also seems to be faster compared to the official Twitter app, which says something.

Change log:

Twitter, version 11.35:
• Updated the Twitter build to 11.35

NeoFreeBird, version 2.2:
• Fixed log in issues using new sign in flow (you can only sign in to one account at once but better than nothing) [78]
• Localized the Post > Tweet replacer
• Improved the Open in Twitter extension
• Minor bug fixes and other minor improvements

There are two versions, one with FixTwitterLogin dylib (standard) and one without. Try the regular one first, and if you’re unable to install it, try the one without. Both have the new sign in flow, the one with FixTwitterLogin just has the same dylib injected as 2.1 rev 2 to trick Attestation in some cases, allowing some users to sign in to multiple accounts. It works for some and not for others.

If you are already signed in to two accounts, you will still stay signed in to them, you just can't add more.

apps.name: Animeko
apps.versionDescription:
• 支持自动跳过 OP 和 ED (部分新番)
• 支持离线使用 (断网后播放缓存)
• 增加弹幕时间偏移设置

---- 
• 优化设置页细节 (2653 by @sukurajima-mai)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/open-ani/animeko/compare/v5.1.0...v5.2.0

| armeabi-v7a (32 位) | 旧手机             | [主线][cf-android-armeabi-v7a] / [备线][ghproxy-android-armeabi-v7a] / [GitHub][github-android-armeabi-v7a] |
| x86_64             | Chromebook 及模拟器 | [主线][cf-android-x86_64] / [备线][ghproxy-android-x86_64] / [GitHub][github-android-x86_64]                |

apps.name: Apollo
apps.versionDescription:
Apollo version: `v1.15.11`
ImprovedCustomApi version: `v1.2.6`

## Release Notes
- Fix video downloads failing on certain v.redd.it videos (issue: https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo-ImprovedCustomApi/issues/75, PR: https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo-ImprovedCustomApi/pull/76)
    - Context: recently, Reddit started using [CMAF media format](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/http-live-streaming/about-the-common-media-application-format-with-http-live-streaming-hls) for serving video content, which Apollo does not natively support downloading for.
## Known Issues
- Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
- Imgur multi-image upload
- Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
- Share URLs in private messages and long-tapping them still open in the in-app browser
apps.localizedDescription: Altstore source and website for Apollo for Reddit (with ImprovedCustomApi)

versions.localizedDescription:
Apollo version: `v1.15.11`
ImprovedCustomApi version: `v1.2.6`

## Release Notes
- Fix video downloads failing on certain v.redd.it videos (issue: https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo-ImprovedCustomApi/issues/75, PR: https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo-ImprovedCustomApi/pull/76)
    - Context: recently, Reddit started using [CMAF media format](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/http-live-streaming/about-the-common-media-application-format-with-http-live-streaming-hls) for serving video content, which Apollo does not natively support downloading for.
## Known Issues
- Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
- Imgur multi-image upload
- Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
- Share URLs in private messages and long-tapping them still open in the in-app browser

apps.name: LiveContainer (Nightly)
apps.versionDescription:
**Commit:** [14c370b986c277e2a871a67712c6015ea32614f1](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/commit/14c370b986c277e2a871a67712c6015ea32614f1)

This is a nightly release [created automatically with GitHub Actions workflow](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/actions/runs/20401832822/attempts/1).
apps.localizedDescription: Run iOS apps without actually installing them!

versions.localizedDescription:
**Commit:** [14c370b986c277e2a871a67712c6015ea32614f1](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/commit/14c370b986c277e2a871a67712c6015ea32614f1)
**Message:** Fix #1047

This is a nightly release [created automatically with GitHub Actions workflow](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/actions/runs/20401832822/attempts/1).

# ⚠️This version ⚠️REQUIRES⚠️ SideStore 0.6.2+ / AltStore 2.2.1+ to install.
>[!Note]
> This a minor release that solves the following issues in version 3.6.0 and adds the following features. For more information, please see [3.6.0 release note](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/releases/tag/3.6.0).

- Fixed an issue where symbol offset caches were not reset after an iOS update, causing crashes. Fixes #765 #757 #760  
- Fixed a bug where window controls could appear behind the status bar if the app was terminated while in full-screen mode with the dock hidden. Fixes #742  
- Fixed an issue preventing the built-in SideStore from deactivating apps. Fixes #725  
- Fixed a problem where LiveContainer failed to locate certain symbols in dyld on iPad 7 running iOS 18.6. Fixes #746  
- Fixed a crash that could occur when LiveContainer attempted to check if another instance of LiveContainer was running. Fixes #751  
- Fixed an issue where LiveContainer tries to open private app in another LiveContainer if an app is running in the primary LiveContainer.

# New Features
- On iPad, LiveContainer will now only open a new window in full-screen mode if LiveContainer itself is already in full-screen mode.  
- The "Fix File Picker and Local Notifications" option has been split into three separate options: **Fix File Picker**, **Fix Local Notifications**, and **Use LiveContainer's Bundle ID**. Implements #739  

# Localization
- Updated translations: Arabic, Japanese, Polish, and Brazilian Portuguese.  
- Added Korean translation, contributed by @Dr-Sauce.

**Commit:** [14c370b986c277e2a871a67712c6015ea32614f1](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/commit/14c370b986c277e2a871a67712c6015ea32614f1)
**Message:** Fix #1047

This is a nightly release [created automatically with GitHub Actions workflow](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/actions/runs/20401832822/attempts/1).

- Fixed a bug where window controls could appear behind the status bar if the app was terminated while in full-screen mode with the dock hidden. Fixes #742  
- Fixed an issue preventing the built-in SideStore from deactivating apps. Fixes #725  
- Fixed a problem where LiveContainer failed to locate certain symbols in dyld on iPad 7 running iOS 18.6. Fixes #746  
- Fixed a crash that could occur when LiveContainer attempted to check if another instance of LiveContainer was running. Fixes #751  
- Fixed an issue where LiveContainer tries to open private app in another LiveContainer if an app is running in the primary LiveContainer.

# New Features

- Fixed an issue where symbol offset caches were not reset after an iOS update, causing crashes. Fixes #765 #757 #760  
- Fixed a bug where window controls could appear behind the status bar if the app was terminated while in full-screen mode with the dock hidden. Fixes #742  
- Fixed an issue preventing the built-in SideStore from deactivating apps. Fixes #725  
- Fixed a problem where LiveContainer failed to locate certain symbols in dyld on iPad 7 running iOS 18.6. Fixes #746  
- Fixed a crash that could occur when LiveContainer attempted to check if another instance of LiveContainer was running. Fixes #751  
- Fixed an issue where LiveContainer tries to open private app in another LiveContainer if an app is running in the primary LiveContainer.

# New Features
- On iPad, LiveContainer will now only open a new window in full-screen mode if LiveContainer itself is already in full-screen mode.
